alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:29PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cochise County through 515 PM MST... At 429 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tombstone, or 19 miles northeast of Sierra Vista, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tombstone, Fairbank and Charleston. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 304 and 323. Route 82 between mile markers 58 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
